Module com.pizza_group.project4

Package com.pizza_group.project4

package com.pizza_group.project4
  • Class
    Description
    BBQChicken
    BBQChicken class handles all BBQChicken pizza specific operations in relation to setting the size price and calculating price.
    BuildYourOwn
    BuildYourOwn class handles all BuildYourOwn pizza specific operations in relation to setting the size price, add/removing toppings, and calculating price.
    ChicagoPizza
    Chicago Pizza creates the different flavors of Chicago Pizza and returns each pizza.
    ChicagoStylePizzaController
    A controller class that handles all GUI operations in order to allow users to fully create a Chicago Style Pizza and add it to their order.
    Crust
    Crust enum class stores all types of crusts baked at RUPizza as well as their associated pizza style.
    CurrentOrderController
    CurrentOrderController controls the view of Order by allowing capabilities to place an order, clear an order, and remove pizzas.
    Customizable
    Customizable interface provides a framework for classes who implement it to add/remove orders, pizzas, or toppings.
    Deluxe
    Deluxe class handles all Deluxe pizza specific operations in relation to setting the size price and calculating price.
    MainApplication
    MainApplication sets up the main stage for the main menu and shows it.
    MainController
    MainController creates the main menu, holds methods for navigating to different windows, and methods for managing orders and pizzas.
    Meatzza
    Meatzza class handles all Deluxe pizza specific operations in relation to setting the size price and calculating price.
    NYPizza
    NY Pizza creates the different flavors of NY Pizza and returns each pizza.
    NYStylePizzaController
    A controller class that handles all GUI operations in order to allow users to fully create a NY Style Pizza and add it to their order.
    Order
    Order class contains all the information needed to handle orders containing the pizza classes and the functions that help support actions for maintaining an order such as adding and removing pizzas from an order.
    Pizza
    Pizza class contains all general information shared among pizzas as well as functions to implement Customizable.
    PizzaFactory
    PizzaFactory provides methods for implementation in different styles of pizza to create different flavors of pizza.
    Size
    Size class that stores the three types of size available for all pizzas.
    StoreOrder
    StoreOrder class contains all the information needed to handle store orders containing an observable list of order and the functions that help support actions for maintaining an order such as adding and removing orders from the store order.
    StoreOrdersController
    StoreOrdersController controls the view of StoreOrder by allowing capabilities to cancel a store order, export a store order, and browse through all orders in store order.
    Topping
    Topping class stores all 13 toppings offered at RUPizza, as well as functions to return as a string or get all Toppings.
